text: Marcelo Ríos was the defending champion, but lost in the third round to Todd Martin. Mark Philippoussis won the title, defeating Carlos Moyà 5–7, 6–4, 6–4, 4–6, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *1999 Newsweek Champions Cup Draw Newsweek Champions Cup Category:Indian Wells Masters
title: 1999 Newsweek Champions Cup – Singles
